metadata.title: CVE-2022-47629 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Libksba before 1.6.3 is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability in theCRL signature parser.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47629` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libksba8 - 1.3.5-2ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libksba package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.5-2ubuntu0.18.04.2').
